trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for a member of a type.
trans-unit.target: 为类型的成员提供基类。

trans-unit.source: Type members include fields, methods, properties, constructors and nested types.
trans-unit.target: 类型成员包括字段、方法、属性、构造函数和嵌套类型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeMember> class can be used to represent the declaration for a member of a type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeMember>类可以用于表示类型成员的声明。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeMember> is a base class from which more specific types of members are derived, such as <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeMemberField> and <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeMember> 是一个基类更具体的成员派生类型，如<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeMemberField>和<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod>。

trans-unit.source: This class contains properties and methods common to all type members.
trans-unit.target: 此类包含属性和方法普遍适用于所有类型的成员。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeMember" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeMember" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the attributes of the member.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置成员的特性。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.MemberAttributes" /> values used to indicate the attributes of the member.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.MemberAttributes" /> 值的按位组合用于指示成员的特性。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.CodeDom.MemberAttributes.Private" /> | <see cref="F:System.CodeDom.MemberAttributes.Final" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<see cref="F:System.CodeDom.MemberAttributes.Private" /> | <see cref="F:System.CodeDom.MemberAttributes.Final" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is used to specify the attributes of the type member.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于指定类型成员的特性。

trans-unit.source: Member attributes are classified in groups, with a mask for each group.
trans-unit.target: 成员属性分成多组，与每个组的掩码。

trans-unit.source: The access group consists of flags containing the terms `Public`, `Private`, `Family`, or `Assembly`.
trans-unit.target: 访问组包含标志包含条款`Public`， `Private`， `Family`，或`Assembly`。

trans-unit.source: The scope group includes flags for <xref:System.CodeDom.MemberAttributes.Abstract>, <xref:System.CodeDom.MemberAttributes.Final>, <xref:System.CodeDom.MemberAttributes.Static>, <xref:System.CodeDom.MemberAttributes.Override>, and <xref:System.CodeDom.MemberAttributes.Const>.
trans-unit.target: 范围组包括标志<xref:System.CodeDom.MemberAttributes.Abstract>， <xref:System.CodeDom.MemberAttributes.Final>， <xref:System.CodeDom.MemberAttributes.Static>， <xref:System.CodeDom.MemberAttributes.Override>，和<xref:System.CodeDom.MemberAttributes.Const>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.MemberAttributes.AccessMask> mask identifies the access attributes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.MemberAttributes.AccessMask>掩码标识访问属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.MemberAttributes.ScopeMask> mask identifies the scope attributes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.MemberAttributes.ScopeMask>掩码可标识作用域属性。

trans-unit.source: The default value for the <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeMember.Attributes%2A> property includes flags from both access and scope.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeMember.Attributes%2A>属性包含从访问和作用域的标志。

trans-unit.source: To change either access or scope, first mask out the existing flags and then set the new value.
trans-unit.target: 若要更改访问或作用域，掉现有的第一个掩码标志，然后设置新值。

trans-unit.source: For example, the code statement to identify a constructor (named `constructor1`) as public is `constructor1.Attributes = (constructor1.Attributes & ~MemberAttributes.AccessMask) | MemberAttributes.Public;`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，代码语句以标识一个构造函数 (名为`constructor1`) 为公用是`constructor1.Attributes = (constructor1.Attributes & ~MemberAttributes.AccessMask) | MemberAttributes.Public;`。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of comments for the type member.
trans-unit.target: 获取类型成员的注释集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeCommentStatementCollection" /> that indicates the comments for the member.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeCommentStatementCollection" />，指示成员的注释。

trans-unit.source: The comments in this collection are written to the generated source file just before the declaration of the member.
trans-unit.target: 在此集合中的注释写入到生成的源代码文件的成员声明之前。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the custom attributes of the member.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置成员的自定义特性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection" /> that indicates the custom attributes of the member.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection" />，指示成员的自定义特性。

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to add metadata attributes to the declaration of the member.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可以用于将元数据属性添加到成员的声明。

trans-unit.source: This property is `null` by default and should be checked for content before being referenced.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是`null`默认情况下，所引用之前应检查其内容。

trans-unit.source: Gets the end directives for the member.
trans-unit.target: 获取成员的结束指令。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeDirectiveCollection" /> object containing end directives.
trans-unit.target: 包含结束指令的 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeDirectiveCollection" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the line on which the type member statement occurs.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置类型成员语句所在的行。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeLinePragma" /> object that indicates the location of the type member declaration.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeLinePragma" /> 对象，它指示类型成员声明的位置。

trans-unit.source: This property indicates the location of the type member declaration.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指示的类型成员声明的位置。

trans-unit.source: This property can be used for error reporting and debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可以用于错误报告和调试。

trans-unit.source: The location of the type member declaration can be useful when code is generated based on a template file.
trans-unit.target: 基于模板文件生成代码时，类型成员声明的位置很有用。

trans-unit.source: This value is `null` by default and should be checked for content before being referenced.
trans-unit.target: 此值是`null`默认情况下，所引用之前应检查其内容。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the member.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置成员名。

trans-unit.source: The name of the member.
trans-unit.target: 成员名。

trans-unit.source: Gets the start directives for the member.
trans-unit.target: 获取成员的开始指令。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeDirectiveCollection" /> object containing start directives.
trans-unit.target: 包含开始指令的 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeDirectiveCollection" /> 对象。
